info.name: Canvas Dark Redux
info.description: A fork of ELMS/Canvas Dark that aims to fix several issues I discovered while using it.
info.additionalInfo:
0.1.0

  • Initial release.
  • Fix text colors that were unreadable against the black background.
  • Make the difference between topic replies and topic sub-replies clearer
    • Up to three threads in.
  • Added borders to several elements in each web page, to separate content visually.
  • Fix broken regex for linkâ€” no longer must manually specify campus webpage.
